name: Twoside
description:
What would happen if a idiot decided to make their first game on a gamejam? Well this game is a result of exactly that!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wish I had the time to make more levels, but I had tons of problems with level design (especially in a game like this) and I can't update the game to  make more levels because that would cause me to make more music and im bad at music saoifhasoihf.
